name: Top Hat: A Snowman Building Game
name_original: Top Hat: A Snowman Building Game
description:
Build your snowman the fastest to win! This game was made for the 2022 Game Now! Jam with the theme of "Winter."

For 2 - 6 players.

This game can be played on Tabletopia here:
https://tabletopia.com/games/top-hat-a-snowman-building-game-giei1y/play-now
